channel.title: 7zip files on whonix
channel.description: I cannot seem to open 7zip files whonix from tor. i have always been a windows user but this operation system frustrates the hell out of me. is their a guide on how to save files in whonix?

item.title: 7zip files on whonix
item.dc:creator: BubonicChronicWhonix
item.description:
sudo apt install p7zip

Ark is the program that you want to use to handle the 7zip file.

Read full topic
